amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition by $1 million for protection against E. coli sickness and would have been offset by specified reductions in administrative accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition by $1 million which is offset by specified reductions in other accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 226 (Roll no. 420).
